QuestData.Title: Assault on Stonard
QuestData.Description: This is it, $n. We've made our final push into Stonard itself.$B$BI shouldn't have to remind anyone, but I'll say it anyway: We're not orcs, and we're not going to become them out of revenge or spite. Stonard will not be burned to the ground for us to dance on the ashes.$B$BNo, I want this done right. I want this surgical. Hold your head high and strike down any orc that picks up a weapon.
QuestData.RewardText: You've followed orders well, $n. On behalf of the crown, I'm rewarding you for your bravery on the battlefield.
